PageDescription: Contribute to the ONLYOFFICE project: develop, translate, test, or document and spread the word.
HeroText: Contribute to the ONLYOFFICE open source project and make it even better!
DevelopYourOwnPluginOrMacros: Develop your own plugin or macros for ONLYOFFICE Docs.
CreateYourOwnForm: Create your own form templates and share them with others.
CreateAnExtensionOrModule: Create an extension or module for ONLYOFFICE DocSpace.
DidYouFindABug: Did you find a bug? Report issues on <0>GitHub</0> or <1>Forum</1>.
SocialMediaText: Interact with us on <0>blog</0> or social media channels
SpreadText: Build a connector for your own platform to bring ONLYOFFICE to everyone.
TranslateOOText1: Do you want to help us translate the ONLYOFFICE interface into your mother tongue to make it accessible anywhere in the world?
TranslateOOText2: Join our volunteer translator community writing to us at <0>documentation@onlyoffice.com</0> and get access to our <1>online translation system</1>.
TestOOText1: Become an ONLYOFFICE beta-tester to help us test the upcoming features and solutions.
DocumentOOText1: Have you some tips or tricks to work with ONLYOFFICE more efficiently?
DocumentOOText2: Did not find information on how to use some features?
DocumentOOText3: Do you want to translate the available documentation to your mother tongue?
DocumentOOText4: Contact us at <0>documentation@onlyoffice.com</0> to share your thoughts.
GetTheLatestOONews: Get the latest ONLYOFFICE news delivered to your inbox
MessageWithConfirmation: We sent an email message with confirmation to your email address.
